resources.string: Are there any obstacles around the proposed location, particularly in E-W directions?
Is this village/Site earthquake or flood prone?
Are there any big trees or buildings within 25 meter radius?
Are there any large water bodies within 100 meters radius?
Are there any high tension electric lines over the instrumentation site?
Are there power and transmitter cables nearby?
Which network is available with good signal strength at this location?
Is the proposed site is levelled?
